dublin_core.dcvalue: Smartphone use is growing exponentially and will soon become the only mobile phone handset for about 6 billion users Smartphones are ideal marketing targets as consumers can be reached anytime anywhere Smartphone application app stores are global shops that sell apps to users all around the world Although smartphone stores have a wide collection of health related apps they also have a wide set of harmful apps In this study the availability of pro smoking apps in two of the largest smartphone app stores Apple App store and Android Market was examined
Pro-smoking apps for smartphones: the latest vehicle for the tobacco industry?
